ValueDefinition.Name: MineDockingBuilding
ValueDefinition.Description: Mine docking building for the eco warrior
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxMeasurementstation
ValueDefinition.Description: Maximum measurement station on island
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: OilSourceBuildingLand
ValueDefinition.Description: Building for the oil source to connect on land
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

Property.Name: Trader
Property.Description: Spezial third party property for trader (blackmarket trader)

ValueDefinition.Name: TraderStartTime
ValueDefinition.Description: First time when the trader appears in the world
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: TraderIntervall
ValueDefinition.Description: Intervall when the trader appears constantly in the world
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: TraderLiveTime
ValueDefinition.Description: Time how long stays the black market trade in the world until he disappears
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: TraderShip
ValueDefinition.Description: ship spawned for the ai profile
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: AudioPools
ValueDefinition.Description: Vom Profil verwendete Audio-Pools.

ValueDefinition.Name: AudioGUIDOffset
ValueDefinition.Description: Offest der für dieses Profil auf jede Audio-GUID addiert wird.

Property.Name: AutomaticBuild
Property.Description: Third party automatic build. The buildings are recorded in the island editor.

ValueDefinition.Name: WaitForNextStep
ValueDefinition.Description: Delay between the build ups.
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: OfferTreatyCooldown
ValueDefinition.Description: Wie lange wartet ein Profil bis er den gleichen Vertrag nochmals anbietet nachdem dieser vom Spieler abgelehnt wurde.

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxCompetenceResult
ValueDefinition.Description: Maximales Ergebnis eines einzelnen Kompetenzvergleichswertes und des kompletten Kompetenzvergleichs (in Prozent).

ValueDefinition.Name: CompetenceGrayZone
ValueDefinition.Description: Grauzonen der einzelnen Kopetenzvergleichswerte. Innerhalb dieser Grauzone wird kein "Übergewicht" berechnet. Bsp. Ships Player1: 2; Ships Player 2: 4; GreyZone: 2; CompetenceResult: 0%

ValueDefinition.Name: MessageCategories
ValueDefinition.Description: Kategorie der einzelnen Meldungen. Wird zur Unterteilung der Meldungen im Tab Messsages verwendet.

ValueDefinition.Name: CompetenceIntervall
ValueDefinition.Description: Intervall in welchem der Kopetenzvergleich aktualisiert wird. Nicht zu verwechseln mit dem Intervall in welchem sich das Profil bezüglich vergleichend meldet.

ValueDefinition.Name: AudioPriorities
ValueDefinition.Description: Prioritäten der einzelnen Audio Kategorien.

ValueDefinition.Name: EscortTargetDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: Maximaler Abstand der Eskortierenden Schiffe zum Eskortziel.

ValueDefinition.Name: EscortMaxDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: Maximaler Abstand der Eskortierenden Schiffe zum Eskortziel.

ValueDefinition.Name: EscortTimeOffset
ValueDefinition.Description: Die Eskorte fährt immer zum Zielpunkt in dieser Zeit, also beispielsweise heißt 5 Sekunden dass die Eskorte zu dem Punkt fährt an dem das Ziel-Schiff in 5 Sekunden sein wird. Wenn das Schiff nicht fährt wird die EscortTargetDistance genommen

ValueDefinition.Name: MinBankBookMoney
ValueDefinition.Description: Minimales Vermögen, um Geld in ein BankBook einzuzahlen (PropertyBuild->BankBooks)

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipGroupDistanceToCenter
ValueDefinition.Description: Größe einer Schiffgruppe vom Zentrum aus betrachtet

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipGroupDistanceToNeighbour
ValueDefinition.Description: Abstand zwischen Schiffen in einer Schiffsgruppe

ValueDefinition.Name: UseGroupMovement
ValueDefinition.Description: Wenn auf TRUE gesetzt, nutzen Schiffsgruppen die Gruppenbewegung

ValueDefinition.Name: AreaResolution
ValueDefinition.Description: Resolution for the area manager. Each area entry stores information for a rect with this size
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: TradeReactionsGoldAmount
ValueDefinition.Description: gold amount needed to trigger a trade reaction
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: UnitsInInfluceneMinStrength
ValueDefinition.Description: minimum strength needed to trigger the message UNITS_IN_INFLUENCE
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: IncomeIntervall
ValueDefinition.Description: Intervall where new money is added to the budget

ValueDefinition.Name: BudgetEvents
ValueDefinition.Description: Events that increase or decrease the budget of this thirdparty
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: BasicIncome
ValueDefinition.Description: Basic income for the tp player
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: StartBudget
ValueDefinition.Description: Start money, at the beginning
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: BudgetGUID
ValueDefinition.Description: Generates income by counting Assets of the thirdparty multiply with the value
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxBuildingCost
ValueDefinition.Description: the maximum of price, which the tp pays for an building. The real price will be caped to the maximum price.
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: WarLostBuilding
ValueDefinition.Description: Hostile takeover. If the ai player lost a building the budget will decrease
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: CSLModule
ValueDefinition.Description: Third party control module. Every third party type has an specified module
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: Friends
ValueDefinition.Description: List of friends
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Rivals
ValueDefinition.Description: List of enemies
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinDeclareWarTime
ValueDefinition.Description: time when the character may declare war
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: StartTreaty
ValueDefinition.Description: The treaty this party has at start with all players. If a pair of two compater players have different start treaties the smallest treaty of both will be used
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: IceAgeDuration
ValueDefinition.Description: how long the ice age takes
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MainObject
ValueDefinition.Description: When set the player is defeated after losing the specified object
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxEnemies
ValueDefinition.Description: mamimum number of enemies
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: CheckInterval
ValueDefinition.Description: interval to check if the AI should declare war
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Preconditions
ValueDefinition.Description: preconditions the rival needs to fulfill
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Duration
ValueDefinition.Description: duration of a war
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: AbortConditions
ValueDefinition.Description: if one of this conditions is true the current war will be aborted
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinStrengthPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: strength percentage needed to declare war
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Enemies
ValueDefinition.Description: list of enemies this profile has.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: NeededLevel
ValueDefinition.Description: level needed to use this action
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SlotPosition
ValueDefinition.Description: displays the action button at this position index (starting at index 0)
ValueDefinition.Creator: stauss

ValueDefinition.Name: StartDiplomacyPoints
ValueDefinition.Description: diplomacy points the player starts with
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: DiplomacyPointGenerationLevels
ValueDefinition.Description: max percentage for each diplomacy point generation level. The level is an indicator for the user and has no influence on the gameplay
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Limit
ValueDefinition.Description: The diplomacy point limit for this level
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: PointsPerMinute
ValueDefinition.Description: diplomacy points the player gets on this level per minute
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Points
ValueDefinition.Description: diplomacy points the player gets on this level per minute
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: CSLExpansionModul
ValueDefinition.Description: Expansion modul for build up. For every island where the TP build up expansion, this modul will start
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: PatternName
ValueDefinition.Description: Choose the farmpattern for the thirdparty
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: ActivateExpansion
ValueDefinition.Description: Activate the Feature for the third party
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: Picture
ValueDefinition.Description: *.jpg-file with a picture of this reward
ValueDefinition.Creator: stauss

ValueDefinition.Name: RelativeNeededReputation
ValueDefinition.Description: relative reputation needed to gain this achievement.
ValueDefinition.Creator: stauss

ValueDefinition.Name: Tooltip
ValueDefinition.Description: tooltip on the reputation level buttons
ValueDefinition.Creator: stauss

ValueDefinition.Name: GainedText
ValueDefinition.Description: tooltip of the reputation level
ValueDefinition.Creator: stauss

ValueDefinition.Name: VideoFileName
ValueDefinition.Description: *.bik-file with a video message for this reward
ValueDefinition.Creator: stauss

ValueDefinition.Name: HarbourUnits
ValueDefinition.Description: List of feedback unit definitions.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: Behaviour
ValueDefinition.Description: Behaviour script to use.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: GUID
ValueDefinition.Description: A valid GUID which gets spawned.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: AllowedVariations
ValueDefinition.Description: List of allowed GUID variations. Empty means all.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: Id
ValueDefinition.Description: Id of an allowed GUID varation.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: HarbourMaxUnits
ValueDefinition.Description: Count of max units to spawn for feedback at harbour.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: HarbourRange
ValueDefinition.Description: Range within feedback is generated and units act.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: CityUnits
ValueDefinition.Description: Defines a list of feedback units to use for city recordsets.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: GUID
ValueDefinition.Description: A valid GUID which gets spawned.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: Behaviour
ValueDefinition.Description: Behaviour script to use.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: AllowedVariations
ValueDefinition.Description: List of allowed GUID variations. Empty means all.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: Id
ValueDefinition.Description: Id of an allowed GUID varation.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: FromTo
ValueDefinition.Description: Defines from where to start and where to go. Empty means random.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: FromGUIDS
ValueDefinition.Description: A list of buildigs which is used to spawn the unit. Random if unset or ExcludeFromGUIDS flag is set.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: GUID
ValueDefinition.Description: Valid GUID where the unit starts.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: ToGUIDS
ValueDefinition.Description: A list of buildigs which is used to spawn the unit. Random if unset or ExcludeToGUIDS flag is set.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: GUID
ValueDefinition.Description: Valid GUID where the unit goes to.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: Range
ValueDefinition.Description: Range within the target must be. If 0 CityRange will be used.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: Flags
ValueDefinition.Description: Read flag description of FeedbackBehaviourFlags.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: CityMaxUnits
ValueDefinition.Description: Max count of units per city recordset.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: CityRange
ValueDefinition.Description: Default range of actions for city units.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: SpecialFeedback
ValueDefinition.Description: Feedback script for special cases.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: Functions
ValueDefinition.Description: These functions may be executed at this thirdparty
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Function
ValueDefinition.Description: This function may be executed at this thirdparty
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MaintenanceCost
ValueDefinition.Description: maintenance cost. Only used for functions that may be deactivated
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Cost
ValueDefinition.Description: Resource cost for each level. Everytime the player uses this action the level will be increased. When he doesnt use the action during the duration the level will decrease
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Debug_IgnoreBudget
ValueDefinition.Description: ignores the budget .....
ValueDefinition.Creator: ostrowski

ValueDefinition.Name: Debug_BuildHarbourOnEveryBeach
ValueDefinition.Description: Build harbour on every beach?
ValueDefinition.Creator: ostrowski

ValueDefinition.Name: IgnoreSideTiles
ValueDefinition.Description: Number of tiles to ignore on left and right side of a beach (min. beach length = tiles*2 + 1).
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: CheckRange
ValueDefinition.Description: Number of tiles to check to the left and right from one possible build posisiton. (Can't be > IgnoreSideTiles)
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: PositionType
ValueDefinition.Description: Where to place the harbour best.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: PlayerType
ValueDefinition.Description: Spielertyp des Charakters

ValueDefinition.Name: Nation
ValueDefinition.Description: Zu welcher Nation gehört der Charakter

ValueDefinition.Name: IsAttackable
ValueDefinition.Description: Nur wenn auf true gesetzt kann dieser Spieler angegriffen werden

ValueDefinition.Name: DestroyKontorDropCount
ValueDefinition.Description: how many items are spawned after destroying the kontor
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: DestroyKontorDropPool
ValueDefinition.Description: Aus welchem Reward-Pool wird ein Item gedroppt wenn ein Kontor dieses Spielers von einem menschlichen Spieler zerstört wurde

ValueDefinition.Name: DestroyKontorDropPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: Zu welcher Wahrscheinlichkeit wird ein Item gedroppt wenn ein Kontor dieses Spielers von einem menschlichen Spieler zerstört wurde

ValueDefinition.Name: Difficulty
ValueDefinition.Description: Schwierigkeit des Charakters (ohne Auswirkungen auf das Spiel)

ValueDefinition.Name: NeededMissions
ValueDefinition.Description: List of missions where this character is enabled. Only needed for chapters
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Faction
ValueDefinition.Description: Faction the profile belongs to
ValueDefinition.Creator: strack

ValueDefinition.Name: DiscoveredAtStart
ValueDefinition.Description: when set to true this player is discovered when the game starts
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ThirdpartyIslandType
ValueDefinition.Description: wenn das Profil eine Startinsel hat wird die hier gesetzt
ValueDefinition.Creator: Stony

ValueDefinition.Name: IsSelectable
ValueDefinition.Description: True if the profile is selectable in the game settings
ValueDefinition.Creator: strack

ValueDefinition.Name: CanExploreAtStart
ValueDefinition.Description: Is the player allowed to explore the world at start. If set to false exploring can be activated using thirdparty reactions
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SpawnItemInterval
ValueDefinition.Description: interval where the AI spawns a new item
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SpawnItemPool
ValueDefinition.Description: item pool with items this AI gets in the balanced interval
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: WhiteFlagHitpointPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: Hitpoint percentage where the AI uses a white flag when hit
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ItemUsageStartTime
ValueDefinition.Description: time when the AI starts to use items
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: CSLMainIslandModul
ValueDefinition.Description: Third Party module for build up the main city
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: ActivateMainIsland
ValueDefinition.Description: Activate the feature for the third party
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: CityCentralBuilding
ValueDefinition.Description: Describes the unique central building for the Thirdparty, that checks the position to build the recordset
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: MainIslandPattern
ValueDefinition.Description: Third party main city pattern
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: PropModifier
ValueDefinition.Description: Modifier for the wheightings between those recordsets
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: CheckRadius
ValueDefinition.Description: checks the radius bevor placing the recordset.
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxCountPerIsland
ValueDefinition.Description: The maximum count of this recordset per island.
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: Width
ValueDefinition.Description: Width of the Recordset. Only used by setting the public buildings
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: Height
ValueDefinition.Description: Height of the recordset. Only used by Public buildings
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: MinDockingRecordsetDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: Distance between recordsets which can be connected directly with streets, marked in the islandeditor
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: MinVillageCenterDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: Min distance between 2 village center...
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: MinFarmConnectionDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: Mindestdistanz, sollten 2 Farmrecordsets aneinander gebaut werden.
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: MinFarmCenterDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: Distance to the next Farm Center
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: IslandSelect_NoOtherPlayer
ValueDefinition.Description: If true, the ai dont colonize islands with other players.
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: IslandSelect_PropSize
ValueDefinition.Description: Descripe, the selection chance, by the size of the island.
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: IslandSelect_NeedMine
ValueDefinition.Description: a miningslot musst exist on the island to colonize
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: IslandSelect_SmallestOfBigIsland
ValueDefinition.Description: Choose the smallest Island of the founded Island to colonize
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: RecordsetConnection
ValueDefinition.Description: Kind of connections between recordsets
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: RemoveRadius
ValueDefinition.Description: The AI deletes nature objects in the range of an new placed assets of the recordset.
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: DistToCoast
ValueDefinition.Description: Distance to coast for the recordsets.
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: PlaceRecordsetOnConnection
ValueDefinition.Description: Position of the new recordset depends on connection lines, placed in the recordset. The connectionposition has to be on the same position
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: PlaceCityCentralIsland
ValueDefinition.Description: Place the first City record in the Central of the Island
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: StartKontor
ValueDefinition.Description: start with kontor...
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: InfluenceCheck
ValueDefinition.Description: Check, if the influence are of the player ist connected by their new recordsets
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: BuildMine
ValueDefinition.Description: List of assets which could be placed on mine slots (for expansive chars)
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: ReCaptureDelay
ValueDefinition.Description: Seconds the AI waits until it tries to recapture lost territory.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: MerchantFleet
ValueDefinition.Description: settings for the merchant fleet for each progress level
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipCount
ValueDefinition.Description: Ship count for this level
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SlotCount
ValueDefinition.Description: Number of slots = maximum of trade actions for one station
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SlotCapacity
ValueDefinition.Description: Capacity for a slot
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: BuyBudget
ValueDefinition.Description: Buy budget for a single trade process(The AI buys)
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SellBudget
ValueDefinition.Description: Sell budget for a single trade process(The AI sells)
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinTradeAmount
ValueDefinition.Description: minimum amount of wares traded for a single slot
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxTradeAmount
ValueDefinition.Description: maximum amount of wares traded for a single slot
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MerchantFleetShip
ValueDefinition.Description: ship spawned for the merchant fleet
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ProductWeights
ValueDefinition.Description: weights for each product. 100 is for a default amount. Greater values increase the trade priority and the trade amount, smaller values decrease the priority and the trade amount
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Buy
ValueDefinition.Description: Weight for buying a product(The AI buys)
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Sell
ValueDefinition.Description: Weight for selling a product(The AI sells)
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MerchantFleetStartTime
ValueDefinition.Description: time when the merchant fleet will be started
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: RouteDelay
ValueDefinition.Description: delay between each round
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Messages
ValueDefinition.Description: Meldungen, die vom Charakter verwendet werden

ValueDefinition.Name: Priority
ValueDefinition.Description: Priorität, mit welcher eine Meldung angezeigt wird. *** 0: Meldung wird nur angezeigt, wenn momentan keine Meldung angezeigt wird und sich keine anderen Meldungen in der Warteschlange befinden *** 1: Meldung wird in Warteschlange aufgenommen *** 2: Meldung wird sofort angezeigt *** 10: Meldung wird nicht entfernt über die Zeit. Nur sinnvoll für Meldungen die durch einen anderen Automatismus entfernt werden wie die Handels-Meldung TRADING_MENU_ACTIVATED

ValueDefinition.Name: MinDelay
ValueDefinition.Description: Minimale Verzögerung, mit der eine Meldung gestartet wird

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxDelay
ValueDefinition.Description: Maximale Verzögerung, mit der eine Meldung gestartet wird

ValueDefinition.Name: Reaction
ValueDefinition.Description: Art der Rufveränderung, die die Meldung nach sich zieht *** IncreaseReputation: Ruf steigt um ReactionValue *** DecreaseReputation: Ruf sinkt um ReactionValue *** SetReputation_01: Ruf wird auf Stufe 1 gesetzt *** SetReputation_02: Ruf wird auf Stufe 2 gesetzt *** SetReputation_03: Ruf wird auf Stufe 3 gesetzt *** SetReputation_04: Ruf wird auf Stufe 4 gesetzt *** DeclareWar: Profil erklärt Spieelr den Krieg *** CallForHelp: Profil ersucht den Spiele um Hilfe *** SetTradeTreaty: Vertragszustand wird auf Handelsvertrag gesetzt

ValueDefinition.Name: ReactionValue
ValueDefinition.Description: Konkreter Wert der Rufveränderung Info: Wird nur bei Reaction IncreaseReputation und DecreaseReputation verwendet

ValueDefinition.Name: Text
ValueDefinition.Description: Text der bei Ausgabe der Meldung angezeigt wird. Info: Über den Auswahl-Button wird der TreeView des Texteditors geöffnet und es kann ein bestehender Text ausgewählt oder ein neuer Text hinzugefügt werden.

ValueDefinition.Name: StartIntervall
ValueDefinition.Description: Anzahl, wie oft ein Trigger ausgelöst werden muss, dass die entsprechende Meldung zum ersten Mal gestartet wird

ValueDefinition.Name: Intervall
ValueDefinition.Description: Anzahl, wie oft ein Trigger ausgelöst werden muss, damit die enstprechende Meldung erneut gestartet wird

ValueDefinition.Name: Quest
ValueDefinition.Description: Quest, bei welcher die Meldung verwendet wird. *** Info: Gilt nur für die Trigger der Kategorie Quests. Es werden nur bei speziellen Quests extra Meldungen angelegt, wenn dort ein vom Standard abweichender Text angezeigt werden soll. Wird im Feld eine 0 (=INVALID) gesetzt, wird die Meldung für alle Quests angezeigt, die keine spezielle Meldung besitzen. *** Spezielle Texte werden direkt bei der jeweiligen Quest im QuestEditor auf dem Unterreiter Messages angezeigt und können dort sogar neu angelegt werden.

ValueDefinition.Name: Executor
ValueDefinition.Description: Auslöser des Triggers *** Player: der Spieler *** Self: das Profil selbst *** Third: ein dritter Spieler

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxCallCount
ValueDefinition.Description: Maximale Anzahl, mit welcher die Meldung angezeigt wird

ValueDefinition.Name: Percentage
ValueDefinition.Description: Wahrscheinlichkeit, mit welcher die Meldung angezeigt wird

ValueDefinition.Name: Caption
ValueDefinition.Description: Ausprägung der 4 Rufstufen des Profils. Die Ausprägung wird durch die Obergrenze der entsprechenden Stufe angegeben.

ValueDefinition.Name: HonourBonus
ValueDefinition.Description: Anzahl an Ruhmpunkten, die der Spieler erhält, wenn die Meldung angezeigt wird

ValueDefinition.Name: AudioPools
ValueDefinition.Description: Audiopools, aus welchen bei Anzeige der Meldung eine Audiomeldung gewählt wird *** Info: Über den Auswahl-Button können neue Audiopools hinzugefügt oder gelöscht werden. Für jeden Audiopool kann eine Priorität eingestellt werden, mit welcher eine Audiomeldung aus dem enstprechenden Pool gewählt wird.

ValueDefinition.Name: AudioGUIDs
ValueDefinition.Description: Zusätzliche Audiomeldungen, die bei Anzeige der Meldung ausgewählt werden können *** Info: Über den Auswahl-Button können neue Audiomeldungen hinzugefügt oder gelöscht werden. Für jede Audiomeldung kann eine Priorität eingestellt werden, mit welcher sie gewählt wird.

ValueDefinition.Name: Priority
ValueDefinition.Description: priority of this sound

ValueDefinition.Name: Sex
ValueDefinition.Description: Für welche Geschlechter ist der Sound

ValueDefinition.Name: DisabledAudioGUIDs
ValueDefinition.Description: Audiomeldungen aus den zugewiesenen Audiopools, die für die entsprechende Meldung gesperrt sind *** Info: Auf dem Reiter Sounds werden alle Audiomeldungen, die einer Meldung zugeordnet sind, als Baum angezeigt. *** Bei Linksklick auf die entsprechende Audiomeldung wird diese abgespielt. *** Doppelter Linksklick auf das Symbol vor der Audiomeldung sperrt diese bzw. gibt diese für die entsprechende Meldung. *** Haken: Audiomeldung wird von entsprechender Meldung verwendet *** Kreuz: Audiomeldung ist für entsprechende Meldung gesperrt

ValueDefinition.Name: ScenarioID
ValueDefinition.Description: Spezielle ID für Nachrichten über die Ablaufsteuerung

ValueDefinition.Name: Mood
ValueDefinition.Description: Stimmung des Portraits. Default ist rufabhängig.

ValueDefinition.Name: Timeout
ValueDefinition.Description: Wie lange wird die Nachricht geblockt wenn sie einmal ausgeführt wurde

ValueDefinition.Name: PortraitBackground
ValueDefinition.Description: Hintergrund des Portraits

ValueDefinition.Name: PortraitForeground
ValueDefinition.Description: Vordergrundbild als Portrait

ValueDefinition.Name: Object
ValueDefinition.Description: GUID für spezielle Objekt-Trigger

ValueDefinition.Name: ProfileGUID
ValueDefinition.Description: Profile auf das sich die Meldung beziegt. Für TALK_BOUT_CHARACTER

ValueDefinition.Name: MinPlayTime
ValueDefinition.Description: Wie lange muss das Spiel mindestens laufen

ValueDefinition.Name: TalkingProfile
ValueDefinition.Description: Profil das im Portait angezeigt wird

ValueDefinition.Name: RemoveOnDeselect
ValueDefinition.Description: Wenn auf true gesetzt wird diese Meldung beim Deselektieren eines Objektes automatisch entfernt

ValueDefinition.Name: MissionID
ValueDefinition.Description: MissionID where this message is valid. Ignored when set to 0
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: NeededSwitch
ValueDefinition.Description: This message is only valid when this switch was set
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: IncreasedVariable
ValueDefinition.Description: Variable that will be increased everytime this message was triggered
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: DialogPage
ValueDefinition.Description: Page needed for scenarios
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: PauseDuration
ValueDefinition.Description: the thirdparty menu will not show any other messages during this duration
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: IntermediateLevelNeeded
ValueDefinition.Description: intermediate level the active player needs to triggerthis message
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SecondReactionValue
ValueDefinition.Description: second reaction value. Needed for some action like dialogs. In dialogs this value is the index of the dialog(0 is the first, 1 the second and so on)
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: DataLogEntry
ValueDefinition.Description: Mail that is sent automatically if a player is discovered
ValueDefinition.Creator: strack

ValueDefinition.Name: TargetSearch
ValueDefinition.Description: values the military AI uses to find a target to attack
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinStrength
ValueDefinition.Description: the minimum strength of an attack squad if there are enough units available.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinStrengthPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: min strength percentage needed to attack a target. e.g. 150 means the AI needs to be 3/2 stronger than the enemy
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: AdditionalUnitPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: strength percentage of the units that will be used to attack a target additionally to the units needed
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: AdditionalUnitsStrength
ValueDefinition.Description: min strength of available units used for additional attacking units. Important for targets with a strength of 0 like buildings
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ShareAttackingUnits
ValueDefinition.Description: when set to true the AI uses every available unit to attack the best target
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: TargetSearchInterval
ValueDefinition.Description: interval where the AI checks for a new target
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: WaitUntilFinished
ValueDefinition.Description: when set to true the AI wont start new attacks when an attack is running. This is useful when the AI should use all units available
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: UseAdditionalUnits
ValueDefinition.Description: when set to false no additional units will be used
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MilitaryDangerRadius
ValueDefinition.Description: The radius where the AI checks for other military objects when searching possible targets
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ShareUnits
ValueDefinition.Description: Values the military AI uses when a squad shares its units before attacking
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: the minimum distance where a squad will share its units.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: the maximum distance where a squad will share its units.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: OffsetDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: offset distance used for the sharing point
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: StopWaitingMinStrengthPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: strength percentage where the AI starts the attack even if the group is not together
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxTime
ValueDefinition.Description: max time to share the units
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ForceShareEnemyStrength
ValueDefinition.Description: when the enemy has at least this strength the group will share its units even if the strength percentage is high enough. this is useful when the enemy has a large group because the AI will loose too many units when they do not attack at the same time
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Squad
ValueDefinition.Description: Values the military AI uses for attacking squads
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: EnemySearchDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: distance where a squad searches for enemies while trying to attack the main target
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: FleePercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: strength percentage where a squad starts to flee while attacking. e.g. 50 means a squad starts to flee when the enemy has at least the double strength of the AI
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: FleeMovePercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: strength percentage where a squad starts to flee while moving. e.g. 50 means a squad starts to flee when the enemy has at least the double strength of the AI
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxHuntDuration
ValueDefinition.Description: how long does a squad hunt a single target. After that time the squad will abort this command and block the target for the next time
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: BlockEnemyTime
ValueDefinition.Description: the time a unit will be blocked as an attack target when it was hunted too long
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Range
ValueDefinition.Description: range used for this target check. When set to 0 the default range is used
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinStrengthPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: strength percentage needed to attack a target
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MilitaryPatrol
ValueDefinition.Description: Values the military AI uses for military patrols
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinSize
ValueDefinition.Description: the minimum size of a military patrol
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: EnemySearchDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: the search distance of a military patrol. It will only attack enemies in this range
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: FleePercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: strength percentage where a patrol squad starts to flee while attacking. e.g. 50 means a squad starts to flee when the enemy has at least the double strength of the AI
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: PreferredSize
ValueDefinition.Description: the preferred size of a patrol squad. The AI tries to create patrol groups with this size. Leftover units will be put into a new patrol group
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: CheckPatrolInterval
ValueDefinition.Description: interval where the AI starts new patrols or updates existing ones
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: DistanceToLand
ValueDefinition.Description: The min distance to land for patrol stations
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: UseStrategicPositionPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: percentage that a patrol squad will move to a strategic position instead of a patrol station. Strategic positions are calculated using the stored data for an are like destroyed and killed units/buildings
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SearchAndDestroy
ValueDefinition.Description: values the military AI uses for the "Search and Destroy"-attack. This attack is used when the enemy cannot attack the squad so the AI tries to kill it as soon as possible without regarding other units on the way
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: FleePercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: strength percentage where the current search and destroy mission will be aborted and another target will be searched
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Repair
ValueDefinition.Description: Values the military AI uses to repair military objects
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: HitpointPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: For units in a squad : Units will be repaired when they have less hitpoints than this value
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinStrengthPercentageInDanger
ValueDefinition.Description: When attacking a moving target and there are enemies in range a squad does not repair its units when the strength percentage is less than this value
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: IdleHitpointPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: For idle units : Units will be repaired when they have less hitpoints than this value
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Surround
ValueDefinition.Description: Values the AI uses when surrounding a target. A surround is a good option when the AI has much more units than the enemy.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinStrengthPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: minimum strength percentage needed to surround an enemy
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinSurroundRadius
ValueDefinition.Description: minimum radius for a surround. all units will attack at the same time from each side
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxSurroundRadius
ValueDefinition.Description: maximum radius for a surround. all units will attack at the same time from each side
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SurroundCheckInterval
ValueDefinition.Description: When the target is moving the AI gives new move commands in this interval
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinRemainingWalkTime
ValueDefinition.Description: when the average remaining time to get to the surround position from all members of the squad is at most this time they will start the attack even if they did not reach their destination yet. Only used for moving targets
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinStrength
ValueDefinition.Description: min fleet strength needed to start a surround
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ForceSurroundMinStrength
ValueDefinition.Description: when set to a value greater 0 the AI will always surround the enemy when the strength of a sqad is greater as this value
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: AreaManagement
ValueDefinition.Description: Values the military AI uses to store infos about areas on the world
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: HarbourRadius
ValueDefinition.Description: radius where harbour buildings will register itself
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinDefendStrength
ValueDefinition.Description: min strength needed for an area to count as a defended area
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Defend
ValueDefinition.Description: Values used to defend incoming attacks
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: DefendInterval
ValueDefinition.Description: intervall where the AI checks which points it has to defend
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinStrengthPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: min strength percentage needed to attack a target. e.g. 150 means the AI needs to be 3/2 stronger than the enemy
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: AttackStrongestTargetFirst
ValueDefinition.Description: When set to true the strongest targets which are weak enought to win the battle will be attacked
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: AdditionalUnitPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: strength percentage of the units that will be used to attack a target additionally to the units needed
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ShareDefendUnits
ValueDefinition.Description: when set to true the AI uses every available unit to attack the best target
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinStrength
ValueDefinition.Description: min strength needed to be on this level
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinStrengthPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: min strength percentage needed to be on this level
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Flee
ValueDefinition.Description: When set to false the AI will not flee anymore on this level
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ForceUnitSharing
ValueDefinition.Description: when set to true the AI will keep its units together
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Defend
ValueDefinition.Description: When set to false the AI does not use the defend logic which attacks targets in the area of the AI even if the enemy is a bit stronger. This may be useful to focus on attacking the enemy
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Attack
ValueDefinition.Description: When set to false the AI wont search for attack targets anymore. This may be useful to focus on defending
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: IgnoreStrongTargets
ValueDefinition.Description: when set to true the AI will not attack targets to strong(balanced in the MinStrengthPercentage value of the squad target search). If set to false the AI will attack all possible targets
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: DefensiveUnitPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: how many units should be defensive on this strength level(percentual). For example 25 means that every 4th unit should not be used for attacking
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: CallForSupport
ValueDefinition.Description: values for the call for support. All attacked vehicles may call for support
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Range
ValueDefinition.Description: Range where a vehicle calls for support
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SupportCommands
ValueDefinition.Description: Commands helping when a vehicle calls for support
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Cooldown
ValueDefinition.Description: cooldown for military support when a vehicle was supported
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: DontCallForSupportGoals
ValueDefinition.Description: Unit goals where the AI does not call for help
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: UseKiting
ValueDefinition.Description: When set to true the AI tries to move attacked vehicles back
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinUnitsForKiting
ValueDefinition.Description: minimum amount of units needed to use kiting
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinStrengthPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: min strength percentage needed to use kiting
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MoveDistance
ValueDefinition.Description: distance a ship moves away from an attacker while kiting
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: MinUnitsForMovingAttackers
ValueDefinition.Description: minimum amount of units needed to flee when attacking a moving target. For example 3 means squads with 1 or 2 members do not flee when fighting a moving target
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

Property.Name: PassiveTrade
Property.Description: products, items and special features which need honour to be used

ValueDefinition.Name: LevelTradeData
ValueDefinition.Description: Vom Profil angebotene Waren und Items mit Mengen und Verfügbarken auf den verschiedenen ZivStufen.

ValueDefinition.Name: Products
ValueDefinition.Description: Einstellungen zu den angebotenen Waren

ValueDefinition.Name: Product
ValueDefinition.Description: Zum Verkauf angebotene Ware

ValueDefinition.Name: ProductionTimeMin
ValueDefinition.Description: Minimale Zeit, um 1 Tonne der Ware aufzufüllen. Timer läuft an sobald die Menge weniger ProductCount ist.

ValueDefinition.Name: ProductionTimeMax
ValueDefinition.Description: Maximale Zeit, um 1 Tonne der Ware aufzufüllen. Timer läuft an sobald die Menge weniger ProductCount ist.

ValueDefinition.Name: SellProduct
ValueDefinition.Description: true = Ware steht zum Verkauf. false = Ware wird angekauft.

ValueDefinition.Name: ProductCount
ValueDefinition.Description: Maximale Menge mit der die Ware angeboten wird. Wird ignoriert, wenn auf 0 gesetzt.

ValueDefinition.Name: ProductsProduced
ValueDefinition.Description: Wie viele Tonen der Ware werden pro Intervall produziert.

ValueDefinition.Name: ProductCountAtStart
ValueDefinition.Description: Wieviele Tonen sind bei Spielstart im Kontor bereist vorhanden

ValueDefinition.Name: ItemProductionTimeMin
ValueDefinition.Description: Minimale Zeit um ein neues Item zum Verkauf einzustellen. Der Timer startet, sobald der entsprechende Slot leer ist.

ValueDefinition.Name: ItemProductionTimeMax
ValueDefinition.Description: Maximale Zeit um ein neues Item zum Verkauf einzustellen. Der Timer startet, sobald der entsprechende Slot leer ist.

ValueDefinition.Name: ProductAchievement
ValueDefinition.Description: Errungenschaft, die benötigt wird, um auf die angebotenen Waren Zugriff zu haben.

ValueDefinition.Name: ItemAchievement
ValueDefinition.Description: Errungenschaft, die benötigt wird, um auf die angebotenen Items Zugriff zu haben.

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxProductSlots
ValueDefinition.Description: max amount of products offered, ignored when set to 0. The set of products will be chosen randomly.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ItemsAtStart
ValueDefinition.Description: Startanzahl an Items (bezogen auf die Anzahlan Verkaufsslots)

ValueDefinition.Name: ItemSlots
ValueDefinition.Description: Item-Pool Zuweisung für die einzelnen Item-Verkaufsslots

ValueDefinition.Name: ItemPool
ValueDefinition.Description: Pool aus dem gewählt wird

ValueDefinition.Name: BuyPrice
ValueDefinition.Description: Der Preis, den der Spieler für die Waren des CSPs zahlt, wenn dieser am eigenen Kontor verkauft. In Prozent vom Standardpreis.

ValueDefinition.Name: SellPrice
ValueDefinition.Description: Der Preis, den der Spieler für seine Waren beim CSPs erhält, wenn Spieler am Kontor des CSP verkauft. In Prozent vom Standardpreis.

ValueDefinition.Name: ItemBuyPrice
ValueDefinition.Description: Modulator auf den Preis, der beim Verkauf von Items verlangt wird

ValueDefinition.Name: ItemSellPrice
ValueDefinition.Description: Modulator auf den Presi, der für Items gezahlt wird

ValueDefinition.Name: PreferredWareSellPrice
ValueDefinition.Description: Preis in Prozent für alle Lieblingswaren des CSP, wenn man dem CSP die Ware verkauft.

ValueDefinition.Name: PreferredWares
ValueDefinition.Description: Lieblingswaren des CSPs

ValueDefinition.Name: UseGlobalIsland
ValueDefinition.Description: when set to true the global island(island 0) will be used too. Needed for characters without a kontor
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: DependOnPlayerProgressLevel
ValueDefinition.Description: The AI progresslevel depends on the progresslevel of the human player. The AI could not have a higher progresslevel then the human player
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: DelayTime
ValueDefinition.Description: By changing the progresslevel, the delaytime means an delay for the next island colonization
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: AskPlayerCooldown
ValueDefinition.Description: Sets the cooldown, if the human player wont accept the incrementation of the progresslevel. Depends on the setting ASKHUMANPLAYER in "level"
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: AskPlayerValue
ValueDefinition.Description: What the third party pays the human player for colonizing an new Island, if it were disabled by the player
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: AskPlayerWithValue
ValueDefinition.Description: try to ask again for island colonization. In this one, he offer some credits for colonization
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: QuestGroups
ValueDefinition.Description: Questgruppen, die das Profil benutzt. Aus den zugewiesen Questgruppen kann das Profil Quests ausschreiben. Pro Pool kann eine maximale anzhal an Quests die gleichzeitig aus dem enstprechenden Pool gestartet werden darf und die Wahrscheinlichkeit, das eine Quest aus dem Pool gestartet wird, eingestellt werden. Zuweisung auch im Questeditor über die entsprechende Quest-Gruppe möglich.

ValueDefinition.Name: Group
ValueDefinition.Description: Zugewiesene Questgruppe

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxRunningQuests
ValueDefinition.Description: Maximale Anzahl an Quests, die gleichzeitig auds dieser Gruppe ausgeschrieben werden dürfen

ValueDefinition.Name: Percentage
ValueDefinition.Description: Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass eine Quest aus dieser Gruppe im angegebenen Intervall ausgewählt wird.

ValueDefinition.Name: MaxRunningQuests
ValueDefinition.Description: Wie viele Quests darf das Profil maximal gleichzeitig ausschreiben.

ValueDefinition.Name: CheckMaxRunningPools
ValueDefinition.Description: wenn auf TRUE gesetzt startet dieser pool Aufträge nur, wenn nicht die Maximalzahl an Pools erreicht ist

ValueDefinition.Name: WelcomeQuest
ValueDefinition.Description: Quest, die beim ersten Anklicken des Hauptgebäudes gestartet wird (für Neutrale Gebäude verwendet)

ValueDefinition.Name: QuestRewards
ValueDefinition.Description: reward link for each profile reward type
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: QuestNamePools
ValueDefinition.Description: name pools for dynamic quests
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: StatusQuestInterval
ValueDefinition.Description: Interval where this AI checks if a status quest should be started
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: DefaultExecutionPlace
ValueDefinition.Description: default execution place for quests. Used when the execution place in the quest was set to default
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipPercentageToHumanPlayers
ValueDefinition.Description: Verhältnis der Schiffe zu den Schiffen aller menschlichen Spieler, 50% sind beispielsweise halb so viele Schiffe. Es werden aber nie mehr als im Maximum der aktuellen Stufe und nie weniger als das Minimum der aktuellen Stufe gespawnt

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipsPerLevel
ValueDefinition.Description: Minimale und maximale Anzahl an Schiffen pro Stufe

ValueDefinition.Name: Min
ValueDefinition.Description: Minimale Anzahl an Schiffen auf dieser Stufe

ValueDefinition.Name: Max
ValueDefinition.Description: Maximale Anzahl an Schiffen auf dieser Stufe

ValueDefinition.Name: Cost
ValueDefinition.Description: how much the AI has to pay for the ship
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipSpawnPool
ValueDefinition.Description: Pool aus dem Schiffe zum Spawnen ausgewählt werden

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipLoadPool
ValueDefinition.Description: Pool aus dem zufällig eine Ladung bestimmt wird für gespawnte Schiffe

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipHasLoadPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass ein gespawntes Schiff eine Ladung bekommt

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipSpawnIntervall
ValueDefinition.Description: Intervall in dem gecheckt wird ob ein neues Schiff produziert wird

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipSpawnLayers
ValueDefinition.Description: Ship spawn pools for each world layer. The AI checks which layer is the weakest and uses this pool if available. If a pool from a layer is set to 0 the AI will irgnore this layer and use the other ones
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SpawnPool
ValueDefinition.Description: Pool with vehicles this AI spawns for this layer
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Weight
ValueDefinition.Description: weight for this layer. Higher values mean this layer will be produced more, lower values mean this layer will be produced less
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: BuildingType
ValueDefinition.Description: Building type needed
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SpawnAreas
ValueDefinition.Description: Areas where vehicles will be spawned.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Area
ValueDefinition.Description: Area where the ships will be spawned
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SpawnPool
ValueDefinition.Description: vehicles spawned for this area
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SpawnInterval
ValueDefinition.Description: Interval to spawn a new ship
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SquadSize
ValueDefinition.Description: number of members in a suqad on this area
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Active
ValueDefinition.Description: When set to false the area will be active at start
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: SpawnArea
ValueDefinition.Description: area where the ships will be spawned. If not set the normal area will be used
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: LoadPool
ValueDefinition.Description: each spawned ship gets random wares/items from this pool if set
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipHasLoadPercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: percentage that a ship becomes wares/items from the LoadPool
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: StartShips
ValueDefinition.Description: ships spawned at start. These ships will be spawned for inactive areas too
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: WarshipsAtStart
ValueDefinition.Description: warships the AI spawns at start. For AIs with the trader property the ships will be spawned when the ship has arrived
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipPool
ValueDefinition.Description: Pool aus dem Schiffe ausgewählt werden, die verkauft werden

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipCountPerLevel
ValueDefinition.Description: Wie viele Schiffe werden gleichzeitig pro Stufe zum Verkauf angeboten (Schiffsverkaufsslots)

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipSellCooldown
ValueDefinition.Description: Spawn-Pause nach dem ein Schiff verkauft wurde.

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipBuyPricePercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: Wieviel Prozent des normalen Preises zahlt der CSP für Schiffe. 0=CSP kauft keine Schiffe

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipSellPricePercentage
ValueDefinition.Description: Wieviel Prozent des Standardpreises verlangt der CSP für seine Schiffe ?

ValueDefinition.Name: SellShipsPlayerAlreadyOwns
ValueDefinition.Description: Wenn auf false gestellt werden keine Schiffe verkauft, die der Spieler schon besitzt.(Schiffe mit derselben GUID)

ValueDefinition.Name: ShipTradeEnabled
ValueDefinition.Description: wenn auf false gesetzt ist der Schiffshandel beim Start ausgeschaltet und kann über Meldungen wieder angeschaltet werden

ValueDefinition.Name: CheckShipLimit
ValueDefinition.Description: Wenn auf true gesetzt dürfen keine Schiffe verkauft werden wenn das Schiffslimit erreicht wurde

ValueDefinition.Name: Name
ValueDefinition.Description: Name des Profils

ValueDefinition.Name: GUID
ValueDefinition.Description: GUID des Profils

ValueDefinition.Name: WikiPage
ValueDefinition.Description: Name of the page after https://wiki.related-designs.de/wiki/display/Anno5/
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Creator
ValueDefinition.Description: Creator of this profile
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: CreationTime
ValueDefinition.Description: time when this profile was created
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: Comments
ValueDefinition.Description: List of comments for this asset
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: AcquisitionRetryTime
ValueDefinition.Description: Intervall, when the ai trys to get shares
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: AcquisitionValue
ValueDefinition.Description: Price to get an share from an island
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: Aggressive
ValueDefinition.Description: Value between 0 and 10. 10 Means, the ai trys realy aggressive to takeover enemy islands. 0 = defensive. The ai trys only to defend their own islands
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: DefenceCooldown
ValueDefinition.Description: Time, when the ai trys to get back his own islandshares
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: AttackIsPlayerPurchase
ValueDefinition.Description: 0-100 Property additional to get an humans island
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: ShareRebuyFactor
ValueDefinition.Description: Factor of the rebuy of an share. 0 - 100%
ValueDefinition.Creator: brauchle

ValueDefinition.Name: Transporter
ValueDefinition.Description: transporter spawned
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: TransporterEscort
ValueDefinition.Description: Escort for the transporter for each progress level
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: ShippingList
ValueDefinition.Description: Products to ship away.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: Product
ValueDefinition.Description: Product to ship.
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: Amount
ValueDefinition.Description: Amount of goods to duplicate from stock (in percent).
ValueDefinition.Creator: mader

ValueDefinition.Name: UnitGoalPriorities
ValueDefinition.Description: Priority for each goal a unit may have
ValueDefinition.Creator: mais

ValueDefinition.Name: PortraitFilename
ValueDefinition.Description: Portrait des Profils

ValueDefinition.Name: PortraitBackground
ValueDefinition.Description: Background-File des Profil-Portraits

ValueDefinition.Name: PortraitBackgroundVideo
ValueDefinition.Description: Background-Video des Profil-Portraits
ValueDefinition.Creator: stauss

ValueDefinition.Name: Sex
ValueDefinition.Description: Geschlecht des Charakters

ValueDefinition.Name: ShortName
ValueDefinition.Description: Kurzname des Charakters. Beispielsweise "Richard" statt "Lord Richard Northburg"

ValueDefinition.Name: SymbolTexture
ValueDefinition.Description: Textur für das Symbol des Charakters

ValueDefinition.Name: Symbol
ValueDefinition.Description: Für den Charakter verwendetes Symbol

ValueDefinition.Name: Picture
ValueDefinition.Description: Für die Profilauswahl im Menü verwendetes Bild

ValueDefinition.Name: SymbolBackground
ValueDefinition.Description: Background für das Symbol des Charakters
ValueDefinition.Creator: weber

ValueDefinition.Name: LargePicture
ValueDefinition.Description: Großes Bild des Charakters
ValueDefinition.Creator: weber

ValueDefinition.Name: PictureMirrored
ValueDefinition.Description: Bild, in dem der Charakter nach links sieht
ValueDefinition.Creator: weber

ValueDefinition.Name: Description
ValueDefinition.Description: Text zur Beschreibung des Profils

ValueDefinition.Name: DescriptionShort
ValueDefinition.Description: short profile desciption used in the player selection menu
ValueDefinition.Creator: stauss
